mapper.select: SELECT * FROM FIN_Order WHERE Deleted = 0 AND OrderNo = #{orderNo} ORDER BY ID DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FIN_Order (OrderNo, OpenID, Fee, GoodsType, PrepayID, State, Tag, Deleted, CreateTime, UpdateTime) VALUES (#{orderNo}, #{openId}, #{fee}, #{goodsType}, NULL, 0, #{tag}, 0, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE FIN_Order SET PrepayID = #{prepayId}, State = 1, UpdateTime = NOW() WHERE OrderNo = #{orderNo} AND State = 0 AND Deleted = 0
UPDATE FIN_Order SET State = 5, UpdateTime = NOW() WHERE OrderNo = #{orderNo} AND State = 1 AND Deleted = 0
UPDATE FIN_Order SET State = 2, UpdateTime = NOW() WHERE OrderNo = #{orderNo} AND State = 1 AND Deleted = 0
